stripped_text: As an additional cost to rez this upgrade, forfeit 1 agenda. The first time each turn you advance a card in the root of or protecting this server, place 1 more advancement counter on that card.
text:
As an additional cost to rez this upgrade, forfeit 1 agenda.
The first time each turn you advance a card in the root of or protecting this server, place 1 more advancement counter on that card.
title: Oberth Protocol
